word_mean: 驾驶船舶在海洋上航行的知识和技能。

sentence.Network_en: The journey round Cape Horn demanded a high degree of seamanship.
sentence.Network_cn: 绕好望角航行要求有高超的航海技术.

sentence.Network_en: We are only at the beginning of the voyage, and have to learn an entirely new system of seamanship.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们刚刚踏上航程的第一步, 还有一个全新的航海技术要学呢.

sentence.Network_en: Their extensive fishing trade was an excellent nursery for seamanship.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们广泛的渔业贸易是航海技术的一个良好的养成所.

entry.def: Seamanship is skill in managing a boat and controlling its movement through the sea.
